1 
    2 -- | This module supplies the CombMap alias for Map Comb by defining a
    3 -- Hashable instance for Comb.
    4 module Strappy.CombMap 
    5 (
    6 
    7  CombMap
    8                     -- * Operators
    9                     ,(!), (\\)
   10 
   11                     -- * Query
   12                     , null
   13                     , size
   14                     , member
   15                     , notMember
   16                     , lookup
   17                     , findWithDefault
   18 
   19                     -- * Construction
   20                     , empty
   21                     , singleton
   22 
   23                     -- ** Insertion
   24                     , insert
   25                     , insertWith, insertWithKey, insertLookupWithKey
   26 
   27                     -- ** Delete\/Update
   28                     , delete
   29                     , adjust
   30                     , adjustWithKey
   31                     , update
   32                     , updateWithKey
   33                     , updateLookupWithKey
   34                     , alter
   35 
   36                     -- * Combine
   37 
   38                     -- ** Union
   39                     , union
   40                     , unionWith
   41                     , unionWithKey
   42                     , unions
   43                     , unionsWith
   44 
   45                     -- ** Difference
   46                     , difference
   47                     , differenceWith
   48                     , differenceWithKey
   49 
   50                     -- ** Intersection
   51                     , intersection
   52                     , intersectionWith
   53                     , intersectionWithKey
   54 
   55                     -- * Traversal
   56                     -- ** Map
   57                     , map
   58                     , mapWithKey
   59                     , mapAccum
   60                     , mapAccumWithKey
   61 
   62                     -- ** Fold
   63                     , fold
   64                     , foldWithKey
   65 
   66                     -- * Conversion
   67                     , elems
   68                     , keys
   69                     , keysSet
   70                     , assocs
   71 
   72                     -- ** Lists
   73                     , toList
   74                     , fromList
   75                     , fromListWith
   76                     , fromListWithKey
   77 
   78                     -- * Filter
   79                     , filter
   80                     , filterWithKey
   81                     , partition
   82                     , partitionWithKey
   83 
   84                     , mapMaybe
   85                     , mapMaybeWithKey
   86                     , mapEither
   87                     , mapEitherWithKey
   88 
   89                     -- * Submap
   90                     , isSubmapOf, isSubmapOfBy
   91                     , isProperSubmapOf, isProperSubmapOfBy
   92 
   93 , showCombMap
   94 ) 
   95 where
   96 
   97 import Prelude hiding (lookup,map,filter,null)
   98 import qualified Prelude as Prelude
   99 import Data.HashMap 
  100 import Data.Hashable
  101 
  102 import Strappy.CL
  103 
  104 type CombMap a = Map Comb a
  105 
  106 instance Hashable Comb where
  107     hash (CLeaf name _ _) = hash name
  108     hash CApp{lComb=cl, rComb=cr} = hash cl `hashWithSalt` hash cr
  109 
  110 showCombMap :: Show a => CombMap a -> String
  111 showCombMap cm = unlines $ Prelude.map (\(k, a) -> show k ++ ": " ++ show a ) 
  112                  $ toList cm
  113
